name: Celina Terry
review_text: Amazing product with very good sound quality, awesome bass, compact size and lightweight. I will recommend this product without any confusion.

name: Yvonne Carpenter
review_text: Very good build qualify with virgin plastic material. Soft earpad and removable. Very long battery life that support upto 18 hour music playback.

name: Albert Cook
review_text: Awesome noise cancellation feature makes me feel the pure musical bass and beat. I am able to play music more than 16 hours continuously without any interruption.

name: Ruben Mckinney
review_text: Mind blowing headphone with great sound quality, noise cancellation feature, supports both bluetooth and 3.5 mm input makes it a versatile choice.

name: Mabel Marshall
review_text: Personally I love the design, color, asthetic feel it gives. Long battery live provides me upto 20 hours of continuous music playback.

name: Peter Silva
review_text: If some ask me about this product, I would say its one of the best choice in its pricing category. Best value for money product comparing to other product.

name: Jeremiah Mcdonalid
review_text: Particularly this product is offering some of the special features that other products may not offer in this pricing category.

name: Danielle Holmes
review_text: Awesome bass, pure musical beat, good build material, awesome color combo, removable earpad, long lasting battery. What else I can get with its competitive pricing.

name: Don Reed
review_text: The best part of this product is that it provides up to 18 hours of continuous music playback time which satisfy my needs for regular use.
